content: is now live and the Battle Royale phenomenon's players are getting their first taste of a changed map that features a new location in the Wailing Woods to the north-east and a floating island complete with haunted castle above Loot Lake.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: In a blog post detailing the patch notes for Fortnite version 6.0, Epic said that fans will be able to explore a changed map with floating islands and new corrupted areas, players will now be able to take pets and there is the new Shadow Stones, a new consumable that allows you to 'become one with the shadows'. However, shadow stones are temporarily disabled due to a bug that allowed players to 'phase' into closed areas and retain access to weaponry. Which wasn't supposed to happen. Epic do not have a estimated time for the fix.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: After a short period of downtime, which began at 9am BST,

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p a span

content: is now live and players are exploring the map after Epic revealed a host of information about the new season this earlier this morning.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: he latest tease yesterday, featured a glowering wolf figure, again reflected in the side of 'Kevin', the mysterious purple cube that has been travelling the Fortnite map for the last few weeks of Season 5. It simply came with the caption 'Tomorrow'. PS4 players were also treated to the news that

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p a span
html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: , meaning players can now play with friends on other platforms Xbox One, Switch, PC and mobile.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span

content: pic revealed the first teaser image on its Twitter account on Monday, with purple lightning shrouded llama-esque robot figure with the tagline "All great parties need a DJ".

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: A masked cowgirl followed on Tuesday. All teasers have been reflected in the side of Kevin, fuelling the fan theory that Fortnite Season 6 will feature an evil mirror universe theme. Epic has confirmed that players will have to contest with the 'corruption of the cube'.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: he messages have been as cryptic as anything in the lead up to the end of Season 5 and beginning of Season 6, but could offer a glimpse at one of the new skins. August was a record-breaking month for the game of the moment, with 78.3m players logging in to battle 99 other players in an effort to be the last combatant standing.

content: Added momentum functionality to Grapplers. When hitting a moving object (vehicle, player), its momentum will be added to your launch force.

content: This only happens when the momentum would be a net gain, you cannot lose momentum.

content: Choosing your configuration has changed to a selector on the left side of the menu.

content: After selecting Custom, the right side of the menu becomes buttons that are selectable. When a button is clicked, it opens a list of actions that can be assigned to that button.

content: Mode selection (Combat, Build) has changed to selectable by triggers. When in either Combat or Build mode, the actions for that mode and the actions that span between modes will appear in the ???????actions list??????? to select from.

content: Players using a keyboard and mouse on PS4 will now be put into the PC matchmaking pool.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div ul li p span
content: Start matchmaking with your preferred input device. You will be queued with the input type you press the ???????Play??????? or "Ready" button with.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div ul li span
content: If you start matchmaking with a keyboard and mouse, then you'll be queued in the PC matchmaking pool. However, you'll be able to switch to a controller mid-match if you'd like.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div ul li span
content: If you start matchmaking with a controller, then you'll remain in your platforms normal queue. However, you'll be unable to switch to a keyboard and mouse mid-match.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div ul li span
content: PC players are unaffected by this change. If you use a controller on PC then you'll remain in the PC matchmaking queue.

content: Increased the precision and frequency of rotation values sent over the network so that changes to other player rotations and aim direction appear to be smoother.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div ul li span
content: Improvements made to prevent players from appearing to have jittery movement, especially during skydiving.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div ul li span
content: Caused by incorrect acceleration values being sent over the network.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div h3 span
content: What is the Fortnite story so far?

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: Despite Fortnite????????s simplicity in its core mechanics --drop onto an island, find weapons, survive until the end-- Epic have built an intriguing brand of environmental and even real-world narrative of colliding parallel worlds into its game.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: Back in July a rocket launched across its map, creating a giant crack in the sky. Rifts then started appearing around Fortnite????????s map, changing locations significantly as the game????????s world and the real world collided. A sign for Durr Burger in Fortnite, sucked out of the game, appeared in the real-world California desert.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: eanwhile Fortnite????????s map has undergone significant changes, with a comet crashing into Dusty Depot, leaving just a crater with variable gravity. Film sets have appeared as well as various other changes. MOisty mire in the south-east, was replaced by Paradise Palms, a desert biome apparently pulled in from that California location.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: Tilted Towers, meanwhile, was destroyed by the purple cube that travelled the map throughout season 5 after dropping out of the rift.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: Now the cube, dubbed ???????Kevin???????? has found its final resting place in Loot Lake, turning the contentious water mass in the centre of the map into a jelly trampoline. What will happen in Season 6 will likely be related to Kevin????????s journey.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div h3 span
content: How has the map changed in Fortnite Season 6?

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: here are new locations in the form of the Wailing Wood to the north-east and corn fields, while corrupted areas have sprung up around the map for a nice visual change.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: oot Lake has also changed significantly, now with a floating island above its black waters. It was previously a gelatinous purple mass, with runes beneath the surface suggesting that its full transformation is yet to come. That has come to pass with the emergence of the haunted castle on the island above. Loot Lake has been a bone of contention for many players, with its water slowing players down or requiring them to use a lot of resources to build across to cross or reach the house at the centre. How it plays now will be one of the interesting gameplay connotations of the floating island.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div h3 span
content: What new skins, challenges and items will be on offer in Fortnite Season 6?

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: The new skins, or costumes, in Fortnite season 6 feature a Halloween party theme. The first two skins that come with the battle pass in tier 1 are DJ Yonder, the Daft punk-esque llama and Calamity, the cowgirl whose outfit upgrades five times to reach the full kit of the teaser image below.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div p span
content: Giddy-Up, a guy riding an inflatable llama, is unlocked at Tier 23. Fable, a Red Riding Hood skin is unlocked at Tier 47. The fabulously vampiric Dusk is at 71. Pumpkin-headed Nightshade is at 86. Werewolf Dire rounds off the set at Tier 100, though you have to earn XP to see him go from regular teenager to full blown hound.

tag: html body div div main div div article div div div figure figcaption span
content: A selection of the new Fortnite season 6 skins as seen on the loading screen
